metadata.title: CVE-2016-5263 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The nsDisplayList::HitTest function in Mozilla Firefox before 48.0 andFirefox ESR 45.x before 45.3 mishandles rendering display transformation,which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted website that leverages "type confusion."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5263` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
